story:
Move I Rotate I Vibrate

Immersit, a plug & play device installed under your couch, can generate a very high amount of movement patterns and vibrations ranging from explosive to subtle: pitches, rolls & heaves, moving users back & forth, from side to side and up & down. 
All these, combined with intelligent vibrations and an adjustable intensity, result in the ultimate movie and gaming experience in which each explosion, wave & sharp turn is felt directly by the user from his own furniture.

In the press

  • "SPOILER : IT WAS PRETTY COOL." - Engadget

  • "My palms were surprisingly sweaty" - The Verge

  • "A furniture add-on that will change the way you play games." - Ubergizmo


    The genesis. 

Our reason for starting this project is simple: watching movies or playing games at home becomes a matter of routine. We all do it the same way: passively. But who hasn't dreamt of riding the hoverboard in Back to the Future, piloting one of the pod racers in Star Wars or even feeling the vibration of a machine-gun while playing an FPS game?

We became frustrated by the fact that the only 4D simrides were only professionnal and ridiculously expensive (read: tens of thousands of dollars) and were so complex to use. They often require a specific computer, drivers and a huge amount of space.

The idea behind Immersit was to keep this level of sensations with an easy to use device, that is autonomous, intelligent and totally adaptable to your living space ... your couch.
In 2015, we decided to come up with a solution to this problem ourselves, and we are now ready to share it with the world. 

For us, it is a kid's dream come true.

Step inside your favourite game. 

Immersit is a fully functionnal device that comes with sophisticated motion hardware and software that makes it ready to play right out of the box, with many games.  
Using different signal combinations, Immersit automatically recognizes the game status and the movement to create. You are 100% in control of the movements, if you'd rather have a specific movement during a specific action, simply set it in the app where you are able to customize your gaming experience to your liking.

Right now, Immersit is compatible with X-Box (One, 360), Playstation (3 and 4), PCs and over 120 different games.

Live your favourite movie. 

Immersit is the ultimate enhancement for movie lovers as it breathes new life into old films. Imagine seeing some of the most timeless movies again and living the experience as if you were watching them for the first time. New releases will be even more thrilling.

Beforehand, our software translates movie motions into perfect movements and vibrations to get you immersed in the most appropriate manner. Our team then verifies and modifies those motion codes if needed so that each action is perfectly translated into the right motion. At home Immersit uses a combination of different technologies to recognize any media being played on your monitor regardless of the sources ( DVD, Blu ray player, VOD platform and so forth). Once the movie is recognized, the couch then starts moving and vibrating in a synchronized manner with the on-screen action.  

Immersit is for your body what VR is for your brain. 

2016 is the year of Virtual Reality. Unfortunately VR doesn't provide you the full experience. It successfuly tricks your brain into thinking you are elsewhere, but your body can not be tricked without real physical signals.

Now imagine the sensations you could have if you mixed the best VR headsets with Immersit. Your body would send the right signal to your bain, that would correspond with what you see, hence giving you the full virtual experience. Imagine being on a roller coaster, feeling the drop approaching and the sensation in your stomach as your couch tilts forward. 


Re-live your own personnal adventure the right way. 

What if you could live your own personnal adventure again and again months after it happened? Whether you're a ski fan, a VTT rider or a skydiver you will have access to our consumer motion platform where you will be able to customise your own motion code for your Go Pro or 360 videos and share the sensations and thrills with your friends & family.

As easy as one, two, three. 

 Immersit consists in:

  • The "muscles" - 4 dynamic pads that provide a combination of over 1000 movements and vibrations for your couch.

  • The "brain" - The pads which are connected to the brain controls its movements.

  • The "heart" - Provides the energy to the whole system. Small and designed, it can be placed behind the couch or on the side and used as a coffee table.

A discreet device that fits under all of your furniture. 

After endless meetings, brainstormings and feedback from beta users, we've designed the best configuration for the device to be as discreet, safe and easy to use as possible. Immersit is hidden discreetly under your sofa and is totally risk-free for your furniture.

Once Immersit’s pads have been deployed, it is really easy to set your couch's, chair's or bed's feet onto Immersit’s pads allowing your furtniture to tilt, rotate and vibrate. As safety is extremely important: Immersit is equipped with multiple sensors that stop its movement as soon as something crawls under the furniture.

We have tested Immersit extensively with couches of different sizes, weights and shapes with up to 1.100 lbs  and analyzed structures using X-ray technology to make sure that no movements or vibrations would damage the furniture.  

Some movements such as torsions are not permitted and our vibrations are always de-synchronized across its 4 feet to avoid any resonant frequency. 
The video below shows a sample of subtle and smooth vibrations that will perfectly imitate  those of an engine running or the bumps in a road as well as some more dynamic and explosive vibrations such as a machine gun or a spacecraft taking off.  


The video below shows some subtle and dynamic motions that can be created by Immersit. 


Prototypes - We currently have two fully working prototypes made of steel, Aluminium, and plastic, as shown in the different videos and photos. 

Our prototypes deliver the full Immersit functionality and experience and have allowed us to refine and test the software - we are still improving it daily and adding features.

Software - Our software is the heart of our device, supporting the Microsoft X-box 360/One and the Sony Playstation 3/4 as well as Linux and Windows.

Design - The design of the manufactured product will be slightly different from the prototype. The final Immersit design will be more stylish than our current prototype. 

Manufacturing - Although we are still in development we currently are completing the manufacturing assessment phase on certain parts and we should be able to start the tooling engineering and manufacturing process in the next couple of months after the certification process.

We're looking forward to working with game designers to create the next generation of immersive platforms at home! All of our Kickstarter backers will get access to the customer motion platform to create custom-made motions of your liking for any of your personal media. 

Join the movement to take games and movies at home to the next level!

story:
What are we going to do with the $3000?

You have the opportunity to be active in the game development.

We will be using this money for the modeling and animation of the Saverian/Human Assassin. As you fund you will get exclusive access to our forums where you will able to share ideas for the game, talk with the entire community, receive exclusive news & content and depending on your perk, chat with the game directors 

 

General Features:

3 distinctive playable classes;

Everything in the game works towards a visually and emotionally impressive playtime experience;

Co-Op Mode (play with your best-friend or with a stranger!);

Online PvP, where you can play in an arena with special characters;

Gigantic and unique world where darkness constantly struggles with the overpowerment of Nature;

There will be many DLC's (Downloadable contents) and some will be free;

Developed by an indie studio with members from Australia to Canada, Portugal and USA!
 

The Game:

Overview:

Incarnot is a RPG single player or Co-op RPG series set in the distant future,  where resources are scarce and the human race is no longer a thriving society. Players will choose between multiple classes from the Saverian Elite force of Human/Cyborg hybrids fuelled by Steam Power. Players will have the opportunity to build and evolve their hero over the course of the series.
 
Plot:
 
Since the wars for resources known as the Carbon Wars, the human race has been left shattered and broken. The remaining population has banded together under the Saverian Banner (adopted from one of the pioneers of the early steam engine, Thomas Savery), in the hope to rebuild a once great society. Unfortunately, due to oil reserves completely drying up, Saverian scientist have been working tirelessly to find an alternate fuel source. This has led to the construction a once obsolete technology from the past, the steam engine.
 
Unfortunately, this technology was inefficient and unpredictable which made it dangerous and time consuming to maintain.
 
Then the first discovery of a never seen before mineral was made. A green mineral with unusual energy properties, that when infused with steam enables the engines to work at a high performance rate.
 
 
 
The need for Carnotium, as it is now been named (based on the Carnot Heat Engine theory), created a new market as the price for this mineral sky rockets. A new age of prospectors and miners are now spreading out into the barren wastelands in search for the mineral. Settlers are expanding out beyond the main cities , building trade routes through vast empty territory.
 
However, not long after the discovery, news of skirmishes between the mining villages and a demon like threat have surfaced along the trade routes. Eye witnesses are telling of being ambushed by creatures that appears to be attracted to the Carnotium stores. They infuse the Carnotium within themselves making them faster, stronger and increasingly powerful.
 
The Saverians ruling body have enacted a plan to combat these unknown forces they have since named 'The Spawn', due to their abilities to spawn lesser beings at will.
 
The maimed prospectors have been fitted out with tech body parts and AI to replace their missing limbs. These will be the elite soldiers that will take on this new threat and win the war for human survival.
 

A bit about us:

We at Rocket Sloth are a small group of indie developers, with grand ideas. However, to make our idea into something we know you will love, we need your help.
 
Rocket Sloth is made up of very talented programmers, designers, artists and audio experts that share a love of this game.
 
We love this story and the gameplay and we do not think it is deserving of a small project such as an IOS game or mini game. We have written a full length story and building our script from the ground up.
 
We are in contact with many industry professionals who are willing to assist us with bringing their next gen skills for the game.

Industry professionals who have worked on games such as Uncharted 2 and Darksiders.
 
We have already invested some of our funds into compiling some resources for, however, like the Saverians, we are lacking in alot of our resources.
 
This is why we need your contribution. With it, we will be able to expand the game to the level that we have designed. We will be able to build the networking infrastructure that will enable team play and provide a visually stunning map and models that will blow you away.
 
Any contribution you make will be greatly appreciated by the team, however, if you do not have the money to contribute, you can help us by rating and providing feed back via our Steam Greenlight Concept page. Even telling your friends about this campaign and the game will help make this game a reality.
 
Thank you from the Rocket Sloth Team.

NOTE:
A perk includes all perks from lower values.

story:
Who are we?

We are Mutations Studio, a professional team of smartphone game developers. We’re hungry, determined, and obsessed with making fun games, and we want people to know it.
We believe that fun is something that people value, and that it can be the driving force in the market. We decided on our name because we want to “mutate” the games put out there, steering them in an even more fun direction, and that’s what we fight for day and night.
At Mutations Studio, we now have a game that we want not only gamers in Japan to play, but gamers around the world. That game is WORLD WAR TITAN : FRONT LINE, and we want to create it together with you.

What’s WWT?

Any current-day gamer is familiar with MOBA games like League of Legends and DotA. After all, it’s said that there are over 70 million MOBA game accounts on the PC market.
While we understand how fun it can be to spend the day in front of your PC with a bottle of your favorite caffeinated beverage, racking up pentas, we also wondered if we could bring the excitement of the MOBA experience to smartphones--a game you can hop into while under your sheets before you go to bed.
To put it simply, we want WWT to be the LoL of the smartphone market. We think we can do that with the game’s unique, smartphone-oriented system that enables short games, its intuitive and simple controls that anyone can pick up, and its cool designs.



We want you to help us make WWT even better!

When we sat down and started to think about how we, a Japanese game studio, could make WWT a game that could be enjoyed by all of you around the world, we found there was one thing we wanted to do over all else.
The idea is simple. We want to make this game together with our fans by listening to what gamers around the world have to say and creating connections with them.
There are tons of MOBA players around the world, but sadly, there are still few in Japan. That’s why we’re looking beyond our borders and to the world! But how can we gather and connect with fans across the globe? Of all the choices out there, we decided that Indiegogo was our best option.
This might sound strange, but what the primary thing we’re seeking though this Indiegogo campaign isn’t funding. It’s for you to become a fan of WWT and our partners in its creation.
To do that, we’re going to share with you the development status of WWT during the beta test, and we’re also going to create a community where gamers, MOBA lovers, and WWT fans can share their honest opinions with us. MOBAs are still unusual in Japan (especially smartphone MOBAs!), as are gaming communities, but we want to create both.



We want gamers around the world to be able to enjoy WWT!

We’re a collective of game developers who are also true gamers. We don’t want to make yet another mobile game that’s been focus-grouped for the Japanese market. We want to make a smartphone game that isn’t afraid to take risks, and we’re confident we can make a quality game that gamers will want to play.
That’s the reason why we want to bring WWT beyond Japan and into your hands around the world, too, and that’s why we’re here on Indiegogo: to make WWT a global game.



We’ve gotten a little long-winded, but thanks for reading this far. Now, for what you’ve really been waiting for, an overview of the game. If you’ve made it this far, trust us--you’ll want to read to the end.





Innovative battle system featuring Titans

The most unique element of WWT’s game system has to be its Titans. Think of them as kings in chess. Titans aren’t playable characters. They’re NPCs that move on their own, but how you use them determines who will be victorious in battle.

While Titans are a key part of any victory, their fearsome power isn’t only aimed at your enemies--you can find yourself on the receiving end, too! Let down your guard for even a moment, and you might meet a grisly end as your own Titan tramples over you.

Players can choose from a variety of classes and skills to create their own customized characters. Fight together with your allies to keep the enemy Titan from advancing while protecting your own!




Unique, awe-inspiring Titan character designs

The artist who is designing these Titans isn’t your run-of-the-mill game designer, either. We’re working with leading special effects makeup artist, modeler, and design artist Tomo Hyakutake, known for his work on major Japanese movies such as GOEMON and Resident Evil: Degeneration.

We think you’ll understand once you see his artwork, but the game is full of fresh, imaginative, and unique Titans depicted in fine detail.

We’re confident that the Titans’ unique nature and their overwhelming sense of scale will make WWT’s visuals unlike anything else you’ve seen on smartphones.




Choose from different 3 nations and fight for supremacy in the Great War mode!

WWT’s world has a World War I-themed motif, and the game takes place between three major nations. Players fight alongside their guildmates in a battle for power in World War mode. Guilds belong to one of the three nations, and they fight in order to contribute to their nation’s success.

Each individual battle will affect the larger situation as nations dominate, struggle, and compete. Victory conditions and rules in individual battles will constantly shift depending on the larger situation, allowing players to enjoy a wide variety of battles.

After each World War event is over, the country with the most points wins. Polish and refine your team’s skills to earn honor and glory!




Form a guild and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard

The game also comes with a guild system that MMO players should be familiar with. The most important thing in WWT is teamwork. Members of the same guild can gather in a lobby whenever they like and chat. Team up with as many as 5 of your friends and put your knowledge, experience, and gaming skills to the test in battle.

You can check battle results through the in-game leaderboard and compete against other guilds for the top rank. You and your guildmates can work together to climb your way up the divisions and ranks.

In the future, we plan to hold tournaments and other competitive events. Just imagine how exciting it would be to play in a global official tournament!





Feel like experiencing the world of WWT as soon as possible?
The alpha version of the game is now available for free. Why not try it out?
We also have community, so please send us your thoughts.

How to access our community

story_txt:
Who are we?
We are Mutations Studio, a professional team of smartphone game developers. We’re hungry, determined, and obsessed with making fun games, and we want people to know it.
We believe that fun is something that people value, and that it can be the driving force in the market. We decided on our name because we want to “mutate” the games put out there, steering them in an even more fun direction, and that’s what we fight for day and night.
At Mutations Studio, we now have a game that we want not only gamers in Japan to play, but gamers around the world. That game is WORLD WAR TITAN : FRONT LINE, and we want to create it together with you.
What’s WWT?
Any current-day gamer is familiar with MOBA games like League of Legends and DotA. After all, it’s said that there are over 70 million MOBA game accounts on the PC market.
While we understand how fun it can be to spend the day in front of your PC with a bottle of your favorite caffeinated beverage, racking up pentas, we also wondered if we could bring the excitement of the MOBA experience to smartphones--a game you can hop into while under your sheets before you go to bed.
To put it simply, we want WWT to be the LoL of the smartphone market. We think we can do that with the game’s unique, smartphone-oriented system that enables short games, its intuitive and simple controls that anyone can pick up, and its cool designs.

We want you to help us make WWT even better!
When we sat down and started to think about how we, a Japanese game studio, could make WWT a game that could be enjoyed by all of you around the world, we found there was one thing we wanted to do over all else.
The idea is simple. We want to make this game together with our fans by listening to what gamers around the world have to say and creating connections with them.
There are tons of MOBA players around the world, but sadly, there are still few in Japan. That’s why we’re looking beyond our borders and to the world! But how can we gather and connect with fans across the globe? Of all the choices out there, we decided that Indiegogo was our best option.
This might sound strange, but what the primary thing we’re seeking though this Indiegogo campaign isn’t funding. It’s for you to become a fan of WWT and our partners in its creation.
To do that, we’re going to share with you the development status of WWT during the beta test, and we’re also going to create a community where gamers, MOBA lovers, and WWT fans can share their honest opinions with us. MOBAs are still unusual in Japan (especially smartphone MOBAs!), as are gaming communities, but we want to create both.

We want gamers around the world to be able to enjoy WWT!
We’re a collective of game developers who are also true gamers. We don’t want to make yet another mobile game that’s been focus-grouped for the Japanese market. We want to make a smartphone game that isn’t afraid to take risks, and we’re confident we can make a quality game that gamers will want to play.
That’s the reason why we want to bring WWT beyond Japan and into your hands around the world, too, and that’s why we’re here on Indiegogo: to make WWT a global game.

We’ve gotten a little long-winded, but thanks for reading this far. Now, for what you’ve really been waiting for, an overview of the game. If you’ve made it this far, trust us--you’ll want to read to the end.


Innovative battle system featuring Titans
The most unique element of WWT’s game system has to be its Titans. Think of them as kings in chess. Titans aren’t playable characters. They’re NPCs that move on their own, but how you use them determines who will be victorious in battle.
While Titans are a key part of any victory, their fearsome power isn’t only aimed at your enemies--you can find yourself on the receiving end, too! Let down your guard for even a moment, and you might meet a grisly end as your own Titan tramples over you.
Players can choose from a variety of classes and skills to create their own customized characters. Fight together with your allies to keep the enemy Titan from advancing while protecting your own!



Unique, awe-inspiring Titan character designs
The artist who is designing these Titans isn’t your run-of-the-mill game designer, either. We’re working with leading special effects makeup artist, modeler, and design artist Tomo Hyakutake, known for his work on major Japanese movies such as GOEMON and Resident Evil: Degeneration.
We think you’ll understand once you see his artwork, but the game is full of fresh, imaginative, and unique Titans depicted in fine detail.
We’re confident that the Titans’ unique nature and their overwhelming sense of scale will make WWT’s visuals unlike anything else you’ve seen on smartphones.



Choose from different 3 nations and fight for supremacy in the Great War mode!
WWT’s world has a World War I-themed motif, and the game takes place between three major nations. Players fight alongside their guildmates in a battle for power in World War mode. Guilds belong to one of the three nations, and they fight in order to contribute to their nation’s success.
Each individual battle will affect the larger situation as nations dominate, struggle, and compete. Victory conditions and rules in individual battles will constantly shift depending on the larger situation, allowing players to enjoy a wide variety of battles.
After each World War event is over, the country with the most points wins. Polish and refine your team’s skills to earn honor and glory!




Form a guild and battle your way to the top of the leaderboard
The game also comes with a guild system that MMO players should be familiar with. The most important thing in WWT is teamwork. Members of the same guild can gather in a lobby whenever they like and chat. Team up with as many as 5 of your friends and put your knowledge, experience, and gaming skills to the test in battle.
You can check battle results through the in-game leaderboard and compete against other guilds for the top rank. You and your guildmates can work together to climb your way up the divisions and ranks.
In the future, we plan to hold tournaments and other competitive events. Just imagine how exciting it would be to play in a global official tournament!




Feel like experiencing the world of WWT as soon as possible?
The alpha version of the game is now available for free. Why not try it out?
We also have community, so please send us your thoughts.

story:
New To Indiegogo? Continue reading through our campaign to see if this project interests you! If so, choose from one of our great backer rewards by clicking on the "perk" you want, or choose to give any amount from $1 up by clicking "contribute now". You then will be prompted to fill out some quick information.  After submitting your information, you will choose to pay through either Paypal or with a card. If we do not reach our total funding goal, all money will be refunded 5 days after the end of our campaign. Thank you so much for your support and taking the time to read about our project! We could not do this without you!


HOW TO PLAY

Here is a simplified version of how to play. For a full explanation of the rules click the WEBSITE link at the bottom of the page.

Touchy Feely is played in rounds. One round per player.

GET READY

  • Give each player a tray and play mat insert.
  • Place everything else in the middle of the table within reach of all players.
  • Select a player to start the game as the Light Keeper and dealer.

STARTING A ROUND

  • The Light Keeper deals out five task cards to each player including his/her self.
  • Each player drafts three task cards and discards the reaming two.

PLAYING A ROUND

  • The Light Keeper checks to see if everyone is ready, starts the timer and then turns out the lights.
  • Once the lights go out everyone tries to complete as many of their tasks as possible.
  • Along with having three task cards the Light Keeper also has the task of turning the lights on between 1 and 2 minutes.
  • As soon as the lights are turned on everyone freezes and leaves everything exactly as it is.
  • Check the timer to see if the lights were turned on within the time limit.

ENDING A ROUND

  • All players return to their seats making sure not to disturb anything.
  • Starting with the Light Keeper, each player reveals their completed task cards and receives their bulbies (points). You must show proof of completion. (For example: If your task was to stack five dice, when the lights are turned on your stack of five dice must still be standing.) 
  • The player to the left of the Light Keeper will start the next round as Light Keeper.

ENDING THE GAME

  • After each player has had a chance to be Light Keeper each player adds up his/her bulbies.
  • The player with the most bulbies wins.

THE TASK CARDS


ABOUT US

Hey everyone! My brother and I are so excited to have the opportunity to show off one of our favorite games, Touchy Feely. We have been playing and creating games since we were kids. We always loved spending time with friends and family playing games and having a good time. Over the past few years, we have really gotten into the design part of games, and now we can't stop!

What We Need & What You Get

We have decided to keep our perks simple but exciting. There are only 3 levels of perks available to purchase.
  • First is our early bird deal, the first 50 backers will receive their copy of Touchy Feely at a discounted price. Hurry and get yours while they last!
  • Second is Touchy Feely at its regular price. This will include your very own copy of this one of a kind game!
  • Lastly is Touchy Feely, but with the added perk of a Promotional deck of STEAL task cards. These 31 NEW cards add a new and exciting element to the game. If the task on the card is completed, instead of getting points from the bank you will steal the points from an opponent! These cards will only be able to be purchased durring this campaign, so get your copy while you can!

The Impact

Our goal is to create games that bring people together. In this day in age, it is easy to forget about the people right next to you. We are striving to change that. Strangely enough, games had a huge impact on the way we were raised. They gave us the opportunity to be creative and taught us how to think differently. Playing games brought us closer together and helped us to crave that quality time with the people around us. That is exactly what we hope we can accomplish with our games, and no game does that better than Touchy Feely!

Risks & Challenges

Because this is our first time having a game manufactured, production delays are our primary risk. We have received quotes from the game manufacturer and have everything in place. All the work on our end is complete so the only thing left is to raise the funds to get Touchy Feely into production.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you still can't help! If you like this game and want to see it succeed, or want to see more awesome games in the future, you can help us by getting the word out. Share this link on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and any other social media you use. To make things even easier, just use Indiegogo's share tools. Tell everyone you know, and lets make this game a reality!

THANKS!

We have had so much fun test playing this game and we are super excited for you to have the opportunity to play as well. You never know what is going to happen when the lights go out, or what you'll see when they come back on. Thanks again for taking the time to check out Touchy Feely, we couldn't do this without you!


If you have any questions regarding the campaign don't hesitate to ask. We will answer your questions as soon as possible!


TEST PLAY EXPLANATION

For the backers of our Touchy Feely Test Play perk, please read to understand how to play and what you'll need. Because this perk only comes with Task cards, you will need to supply all the other components in order to play. 
SUPPLIES YOU'LL NEED:
  • A deck of 52 playing cards
  • A pad of paper with a pencil
  • 6 dice
  • 6 Feelies (see below)

  • 6 different colored trays (painted paper/plastic plates matching the colors: Red, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Green, & Orange work well)

  • Easy to read timer

To play, follow the rules supplied at the top of the page. The main difference when test playing is the timer. When using the timer, make sure it is an easy to use digital timer that counts UP. At the start of the round the Light Keeper will hit the timer to make it start counting. When the Light Keeper turns the lights back on they will need to remember to stop the timer. All rules For the test play version of the game will be the same. Keep each players score on paper, add up the totals at the end of the last round to see who will be crowned the winner!

complete so the only thing left is to raise the funds to get Touchy 
Feely into production.   Other Ways You Can Help We understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you still can't help! If you like this game and want to see it succeed, or want to see more awesome games in the future, you can help us by getting the word out. Share this link on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, and any other social media you use. To make things even easier, just use Indiegogo's share tools. Tell everyone you know, and lets make this game a reality!
THANKS!
We have had so much fun test playing this game and we are super excited 
for you to have the opportunity to play as well. You never know what is 
going to happen when the lights go out, or what you'll see when they come back on. Thanks again for taking the time to check out Touchy Feely, we couldn't do this without you!

If you have any questions regarding the campaign don't hesitate to ask. We will answer your questions as soon as possible!

TEST PLAY EXPLANATION
For the backers of our Touchy Feely Test Play perk, please read to understand how to play and what you'll need. Because this perk only comes with Task cards, you will need to supply all the other components in order to play. 
SUPPLIES YOU'LL NEED:


A deck of 52 playing cards
A pad of paper with a pencil
6 dice
6 Feelies (see below)

6 different colored trays (painted paper/plastic plates matching the colors: Red, Blue, Purple, Yellow, Green, & Orange work well)
Easy to read timer

To play, follow the rules supplied at the top of the page. The main difference when test playing is the timer. When using the timer, make sure it is an easy to use digital timer that counts UP. At the start of the round the Light Keeper will hit the timer to make it start counting. When the Light Keeper turns the lights back on they will need to remember to stop the timer. All rules For the test play version of the game will be the same. Keep each players score on paper, add up the totals at the end of the last round to see who will be crowned the winner!

story:
Atajrubah is an Arabian inspired survival game for the Oculus Rift. Think Minecraft meets DayZ meets the Middle East, but with Ghuls and Djinn instead of Zombies or Creepers.

You can download the latest alpha demo and try it for yourself here : 


The player character (Left) is in a constant struggle with the Ghuls (Right) who prey on wandering travelers. 

I'm a huge fan of MineCraft and DayZ and they are my primary influences. I wanted to create a game that embodies the spirit of those games, but takes place in a setting that people don't often explore much outside of stereotypes.

You find yourself in a land not your own, with no prospect of finding out who you were. You are forced to forge ahead and create a new life. You'll have to scavenge, craft, trade, and fight to stay alive in this harsh environment.

Back in September I invited the guys at IGN Middle East to come check out the Rift and Atajrubah. I thought they just wanted to check out the Oculus Rift, but to my surprise they came down to do an article on Atajrubah and not the Rift! It was a very humbling experience to say the least.

If you're interested, you can check out that article at the link below.

http://me.ign.com/en/feature/14974/meet-atajrubah-the-middle-east-themed-game-for-the-oculus-rift

My Name is Alan Robinson. I'm a visual effects artist and indie developer living in Abu Dhabi, a city in the United Arab Emirates (UAE).

I started working on the game in February of 2013. At first it was only me working on it. I had to wear a lot of hats and it was a huge relief when more people started helping me out.

Now there are seven of us working on the game. I work on the game full time, and the other team members help out when and where they can. I'm very grateful for them! 

We're big believers in emergent game-play - the experiences that come from players interacting with the world and with each other. We want to expand player impact on the environment and its inhabitants far as we can.

We are well aware that our modest $10,000 goal is not enough to take the game all the way to completion. It is, however, enough to help us get the game into online beta. Once in online beta, we'll be able to hear and process more feedback, bringing us greater insight into what players want to see in the game.

Right now the game is still far from complete. We have an alpha demo with prototype crafting and survival mechanics, day/night cycles, creature AI and a large landscape for the player to explore.

We've laid out a variety of rewards that we hope will appeal to everybody. We want as many people as possible to get their hands on the game. You can get the basic alpha package for as little as $5 and some of the perks available include:

- Beta Access + Deep discount on future commercial release.

- A 5 track score composed for the Beta by the talented AJ.Lournie at Forte Sounds Ltd.

- A high resolution concept art E-Book with concept art from the Beta development process.

- Exclusive monthly pre-Beta builds, where your feedback will help shape the game!

Every dollar you contribute goes towards helping us build an Beta with a strong core game play experience. This includes the following:

- Commissioning an amazing , Arabian inspired sound track for the game.

                  

- Developing a flexible and intuitive UI and Menu system.

- Commissioning more character and creature models to populate the world.

           

- Commissioning more concept art to help us shape the world.

      

- Commissioning more environment art assets.


         


- While I am a competent programmer, I simply do not have enough experience with sql databases and network programming. Your contributions will help me bring a network programmer on board who is more experienced with this side of things.

If we don't reach our goal we don't get anything !

  • We want to create an engaging experience for players, while promoting cross-cultural learning through play.

  • Providing a stereotype and religion free environment where players can explore and experience a world inspired by another culture, its folklore, architecture and language.

  • The other team members and I love games, game development and flexing our creative muscles. Atajrubah gives us an outlet to continue doing so and keep our passion alive, while building a community and an experience that's bigger than us.

If you can't contribute any funds to the project, that is ok! You can still help by:

Sharing the campaign on Twitter and Facebook 

  

Vote for us on Steam Greenlight

or even make a YouTube video! 
Anything helps and we appreciate whatever you can give.

story:
Frustrated by the New Right?  You're not alone.

What used to be the Right is now the Center, what used to be the Center is now called Socialist and the Right is being dragged out of bounds by the Tea Party.  So, what's a sensible person to do?  Well, "Let's All Be Republicans," of course!

If you can't beat 'em, join 'em!

"Let's All Be Republicans!" is a fun, new board game for 2-6 players that uses current and historical events, humor and a dash of hyperbole to lampoon the Republican Party.

Roll the dice and advance your game piece around the board.  Draw game cards and you will earn Political Capital or Scandals.  Take a detour down The Road to Power, Money Lane or Influence Alley and earn Power, Money and Influence Credits.  Then visit the Supreme Court, K Street and Congress to use your Power, Money and Influence to buy Votes.  Buy enough Votes to secure your party's nomination and enter the Winner's Circle, and you could win the game.

Who knew politics could be so much fun?

"Let's All Be Republicans!" uses the power of humor to track the many missteps of the New Right.  Experience all the thrills and incompetence of Republican Party politics played at the highest level.

What's in the box?

Each game box contains a "Let's All Be Republicans!" game board, two decks of game cards, four types of game currency, six game tokens, two dice and a set of instructions.  Future updates to the current set of game cards will be available soon through our website, so that your copy of "Let's All Be Republicans!" will always be up to date.

Funding Goal and Project Completion:

For this project, our funding goal is $25,000.  This amount includes the fee for licensing the images used to make the game, the cost of doing a first run of the game and other perk items in a sufficient quantity to offer them at an affordable price point, the cost of shipping all perks and the amount required by Indiegogo for processing a successfully funded project.

The game design is completely finished and ready for production.  Production will begin immediately following successful funding of our project and should take approximately 60 days.  Also, please allow an additional 2-3 weeks for delivery of your rewards.

Thank you very much for your interest in this project.

 

To fill larger orders not specified in our list of perks, all perks may be claimed multiple times.


http://www.letsallberepublicans.com

story:
Hey guys! Based on your feedback, we decided to take the Indie After Party in a different direction. It's still celebrating the indie spirit and with the same great lineup except we will be inviting a few indie studios to showcase their games. We want this party to be the celebration of their art!

Check out the party info at: indieafterparty.com

 

 

 

CONCEPT: The Indie After Party is a private event for gamers, by gamers. 21 and over only, must bring ID.

DATE & TIME: September 1st, 9 PM 'til 2AM.

PLACE: Baltic Room. Fantastic layout. State-of-the-art sound system. Located two blocks from the convention center. Best of all, not a hotel ballroom.

REFRESHMENTS: Open bar until midnight. No digging for cash, no carrying around tickets, just go to the bar and order. Yes, seriously.

MUSIC: Opening set by indie chiptune DJ. Special performance by international nerdcore artist MegaRan. Closing out the night, premier Seattle EDM DJ and producer J.Quest.

The dance-floor shouldn't be a show-floor for the next big AAA flop, and we shouldn't have to wait in line for "open" bars that turn out to be anything but. We’ve all been to these big publisher parties, and they are what they are, but we can do better. We don’t have to have our celebrations revolve around products.

Indie developers showed us that they don't need a publisher to create great entertainment, and that independence doesn’t just apply to games. In the indie spirit, we're taking back creative control of how we party.

Together let’s make the alternative that we deserve, The Indie After Party.

WHY INDIEGOGO?

There can be no owners. This party is about all of us, and we can only make it happen together. As soon as a party is about a company or a product it becomes just an opportunity to sell you something.

This is why we’re using IndieGoGo. It’s important that you know that you had a direct hand in making it happen, so that we all know that the only motive is having a great party. Yes, our names are on this IndieGoGo campaign and we’re organizing it, but our motivation is no different than yours: to go to The Indie After Party.

The pledge amount for the INDIE SUPPORTER tier was set as the minimum needed to cover the cost of the venue and performers based on 200 attendees. By backing at the $57 level you gain entry to The Indie After Party, a digital copy of the making-of documentary, a special MP3 collection featuring the artists from the concert, and access to the photo-stream featuring pictures and videos that you provide.


While 200 is our minimum, the maximum we can accommodate and keep the venue comfortable is 350 attendees, and because of that the tier is limited to 350 backers. If you want to party with your friends, make sure that they all back quickly.

Not only will maxing out the capacity mean we have more people to share this incredible experience with but also allows us to unlock additional stretch goals for everyone’s benefit. Here is what we have planned so far:

  • $17,000 - Professional photobooth with onsite printing to provide a commemorative shot of the night’s shenanigans.
  • $19,000 - Late night snacks provided by hot local Seattle food trucks.
  • $24,000 - The only one that matters: open bar all night long.

INDIE EVANGELISTS

In Humble Bundle style, we’re leveraging the functionality of IndieGoGo which allows you to pledge at any amount above the minimum. By pledging more than $57 in the INDIE SUPPORTER tier, we can hit those stretch goals sooner, making the party better for everyone, and it gives you the opportunity to become an INDIE EVANGELIST.

Here's how it works: at the end of the campaign, the 25 funders who contributed the most in the INDIE SUPPORTER tier will be declared the INDIE EVANGELISTS. The ranking will be updated daily for everyone to see where they stand, giving you the chance to reclaim the top spots if dethroned.

In an attempt to honor the INDIE EVANGELISTS who could contribute more so that everyone can have a better time, we will have special perks for them, which include:

  • INDIE EVANGELIST list displayed during the party.
  • The opportunity to be interviewed in the documentary, giving you the chance to tell the world about your passion for the gaming community.
  • Access to the reserved balcony section with its own bar, private tables, and dedicated hospitality staff.
  • Early access. Get into the party at 8PM, avoid the lines and enjoy networking opportunities.

 

We (Christopher Green and Bill Rooney) are two friends and life-long gamers, and have been attending events like PAX for years. But after PAX East 2013 we experienced the enthusiasm, energy, and passion of the indie gaming community. Now we’re inspired, and dedicated to creating an experience for all of us to share.

We can’t wait to party with all of you!

Keep up with the latest campaign and party updates:

www.IndieAfterParty.com

@IndieAfterParty

story:
Try and master nubiah online

http://nubiah.at/nubiah/nubiah.php

 

About nubiah

Easy to play, hard to master.

Nubiah is a new and tricky strategy game for 2 people, which demands tactical moves. 

The clever and easily understood gameplay offers an even playing field for players of all ages. For that reason, nubiah attracts both young and old strategic game enthusiasts. Whether it be the short game in between or a challenging one to boost the brain power, nubiah will mesmerize you.

Nubiah's game mechanics have already impressed numerous people and are reminiscent of the award-winning strategy game Abalone.

How it all began

Nubiah was developed by Joachim in 2000 and was very successful on a regional level.  Together with his father and grandfather Joachim produced and self-published the first nubiah games. 

To date, Joachim has received demands for nubiah over and over again. He decided to produce and publish nubiah again with a new design and in collaboration with a local carpenter. 

 

How to play

The player, who brings all tiles of his color into the board first, wins.

Start the game by inserting one of your tiles anywhere on the board regardless of the direction. The red-brown tile, pushed out of the board, is taken out of the game. Now it is the second player’s turn. Insert one of your tiles on the board.

The three major rules:

  • If there is an opponent's tile in the selected row, you are only allowed to insert your tile, if the sum of your pips including the pips of the chosen tile, is higher than the opponents sum in that row. Blank tiles have the value zero and do not increase the sum of the pips.
     
  • If a player's tile is pushed out of the game during a turn, it must be taken back by the player of the respective color and brought back into the game.
     
  • Every player is compelled to move, which might mean you are forced to push out one of you own tiles and take it back. 

The game continues in this manner.

The player who inserts the last tile on the board, wins and ends the game.

 

People about nubiah

 

nubiah Designs

We offer nubiah in three different designs. The game elements of nubiah Classic and nubiah Box are manufactured with three different kinds of wood. Nubiah Basic is made of cardboard. With these different designs we want to meet individual preferences. Make your choice, whether it be a more compact game to take with, or a high-quality and robust wooden board game.

 

nubiah Classic

 

nubiah Box

 

nubiah Basic

 

Materials and Production

Each wooden game is unique. Nubiah is a game with character and durability, which brings joy to you and gives entertaining game evenings for decades.
Of course, this requires optimal design and perfect craftsmanship.

The handcrafted wooden game versions are manufactured in a local joiner's workshop with three different kinds of wood.

 

 

The cardboard game, nubiah Basic is produced with high-quality in punching and print. 

 

Production Insight

 

Rewards

We want to share nubiah with as many strategic board game enthusiasts as possible. This is why we offer different rewards in order to meet individual preferences. Even if you don't want to get the game, you can still become a valuable supporter.

Just go for a reward of your choice.

 

Packages

 

 

nubiah's Timeline

 

 Delivery Timeline for Christmas 

Nubiah is the perfect Christmas gift for your loved ones. But as we produce nubiah with a local joinery company, we have limited delivery capacity before Christmas.

Within Europe, the first 500 pieces of wooden games are delivered before Christmas.
Outside Europe, we can not guarantee delivery of wooden games before Christmas.

The cardboard games, nubiah Basic, are delivered worldwide up to 1000 pieces before Christmas. 

In order to still put something under the Christmas tree, we will provide a Gift Certificate for download on our website.

 

Why we need your support

Until now we have produced quite a few nubiah games and it has already impressed many locals. Now we want to extend our nubiah community. With your support we will be able to produce nubiah in three different versions and bring this new game into the world. 

How you can support

By supporting us by reward you help us to produce nubiah. But even without reward, you can still become a valuable supporter.

Additional ways to support and help nubiah succeed:

  • tell your friends and family about nubiah
  • invite your friends to our Facebook page and to this campaign
  • share the links to this campaign  
  • share the links to our Facebook page  
  • post about nubiah on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any other social media channel  
  • SPREAD THE WORD!

 

Follow us on

 

 

We also want to thank our partners for the great cooperation. 

MEDIA

Video: Elias Jerusalem with 2dream productions 

Photos & Website: Patrick Connor Klopf with bluepepper mediendesign  

Shooting location: Blumenhotel St. Veit 

 

PRODUCTION

Joinery: Bernhard Zeiner Tischlerei & Handel 

Packaging and shipping: TEWA  

Print & cardboard game: Signum Druck 

Online Game: Michael Meierhofer 

 

Risks and challenges

Since nubiah is handcrafted and we work with local companies, there are unpredictable factors that could endanger our set timeline. In order to minimize the risk of delays, we reserved the production period in advance and we will inform the suppliers continually about the order quantities.

All team members have family, full-time jobs and studies, therefore the time management will be challenging. But as always, we are dedicated to make sure you know what is happening every step of the way. We will update you about the project course regularly and let you know what's going on.

Any pledge you make brings us one step closer to the goal. Help us to realize nubiah and to build a new game community. Also help us spread the word through sharing this campaign page and linking over to our Facebook page. This networking will help us to reach our funding goal.

Thank you!

Your nubiah - team

Easy to play, hard to master.
Nubiah is a new and tricky strategy game for 2 people, which demands tactical moves. 

The clever and easily understood gameplay offers an even playing field for players of all ages. For that reason, nubiah attracts both young and old strategic game enthusiasts. Whether it be the short game in between or a challenging one to boost the brain power, nubiah will mesmerize you.
Nubiah's game mechanics have already impressed numerous people and are reminiscent of the award-winning strategy game Abalone.
How it all began
Nubiah was developed by Joachim in 2000 and was very successful on a regional level.  Together with his father and grandfather Joachim produced and self-published the first nubiah games. 
To date, Joachim has received demands for nubiah over and over again. He decided to produce and publish nubiah again with a new design and in collaboration with a local carpenter. 
 
How to play
The player, who brings all tiles of his color into the board first, wins.
Start the game by inserting one of your tiles anywhere on the board regardless of the direction. The red-brown tile, pushed out of the board, is taken out of the game. Now it is the second player’s turn. Insert one of your tiles on the board.
The three major rules:

If there is an opponent's tile in the selected row, you are only allowed to insert your tile, if the sum of your pips including the pips of the chosen tile, is higher than the opponents sum in that row. Blank tiles have the value zero and do not increase the sum of the pips. 
If a player's tile is pushed out of the game during a turn, it must be taken back by the player of the respective color and brought back into the game. 
Every player is compelled to move, which might mean you are forced to push out one of you own tiles and take it back. 

The game continues in this manner.
The player who inserts the last tile on the board, wins and ends the game.

 
People about nubiah


 

nubiah Designs
We offer nubiah in three different designs. The game elements of nubiah Classic and nubiah Box are manufactured with three different kinds of wood. Nubiah Basic is made of cardboard. With these different designs we want to meet individual preferences. Make your choice, whether it be a more compact game to take with, or a high-quality and robust wooden board game.
 
nubiah Classic

 
nubiah Box

 
nubiah Basic

 
Materials and Production
Each wooden game is unique. Nubiah is a game with character and durability, which brings joy to you and gives entertaining game evenings for decades.Of course, this requires optimal design and perfect craftsmanship.The handcrafted wooden game versions are manufactured in a local joiner's workshop with three different kinds of wood.  The cardboard game, nubiah Basic is produced with high-quality in punching and print.  
Production Insight

 
Rewards
We want to share nubiah with as many strategic board game enthusiasts as possible. This is why we offer different rewards in order to meet individual preferences. Even if you don't want to get the game, you can still become a valuable supporter.
Just go for a reward of your choice.




 
Packages



 
 
nubiah's Timeline

 

 Delivery Timeline for Christmas 
Nubiah is the perfect Christmas gift for your loved ones. But as we produce nubiah with a local joinery company, we have limited delivery capacity before Christmas.
Within Europe, the first 500 pieces of wooden games are delivered before Christmas.Outside Europe, we can not guarantee delivery of wooden games before Christmas.
The cardboard games, nubiah Basic, are delivered worldwide up to 1000 pieces before Christmas. 
In order to still put something under the Christmas tree, we will provide a Gift Certificate for download on our website.
 
Why we need your support
Until now we have produced quite a few nubiah games and it has already impressed many locals. Now we want to extend our nubiah community. With your support we will be able to produce nubiah in three different versions and bring this new game into the world. 
How you can support

By supporting us by reward you help us to produce nubiah. But even without reward, you can still become a valuable supporter.
Additional ways to support and help nubiah succeed:

tell your friends and family about nubiah
invite your friends to our Facebook page and to this campaign
share the links to this campaign  
share the links to our Facebook page  
post about nubiah on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or any other social media channel  
SPREAD THE WORD!

 
Follow us on
  
We also want to thank our partners for the great cooperation. 
MEDIA
Video: Elias Jerusalem with 2dream productions 
Photos & Website: Patrick Connor Klopf with bluepepper mediendesign  
Shooting location: Blumenhotel St. Veit 
 
PRODUCTION
Joinery: Bernhard Zeiner Tischlerei & Handel 
Packaging and shipping: TEWA  
Print & cardboard game: Signum Druck 
Online Game: Michael Meierhofer 
 
Risks and challenges
Since nubiah is handcrafted and we work with local companies, there are unpredictable factors that could endanger our set timeline. In order to minimize the risk of delays, we reserved the production period in advance and we will inform the suppliers continually about the order quantities.
All team members have family, full-time jobs and studies, therefore the time management will be challenging. But as always, we are dedicated to make sure you know what is happening every step of the way. We will update you about the project course regularly and let you know what's going on.
Any pledge you make brings us one step closer to the goal. Help us to realize nubiah and to build a new game community. Also help us spread the word through sharing this campaign page and linking over to our Facebook page. This networking will help us to reach our funding goal.
Thank you!
Your nubiah - team

story:
Overview

Hi there! I'm Nuno, and I have always loved videogames. I have been making games making for a while now, released 10 and I'm now ready to take on a bigger project and launch my first commercial project.

I'm here to ask the Indiegogo community for support to help me released my first commercial game. It has always been my dream to create a game worthy of a big platform, like Steam!

Mutation Miracle is 2D Plarform Shooter game where every kill you make changes the way the game works. You can become small, your bullets can deal more damage, the enemies can explode, the gravity can be nullified, you never know what is going to happen when you kill an enemy! There are tons of characters to unlock and dozens of different maps.

 

 

What I Need & What You Get

 

Moving on to funding. I need about 800€. This money will be used to buy gear that will make Mutation Miracle's quality improve drastically. For example, a music program, a MIDI keyboard, a microphone (and maybe some art programs). The money will also help to pay the 100€ fee to put the game on Steam, and buy a camera so I can make regular devlogs to show you all how the development of this game is going. In exchange for your amazing help, you get unique and awesome perks! Starting with your name in the credits of the game and of the videos I will make, you can also get a Steam Key for a discount price and access to the Mutation Miracle Discord, or the Steam Key with the Original Soundtrack (also at a discount a price). The Double Mutation Supporter tier includes 2 Stean Keys with the OST (so you can share the with a friend), your name in the credits, access to the game's Discord and exclusive Beta Testing! The Enemy Mutator Designer, Level Mutator Designer, Level Mutator Designer tiers are different, because you can directly take part of this game's development, since you can design an enemy, a character skin or a level, respectively! Now the Miracle of Mutation Miracle tier is for very special and generous people: you get ALL the previous rewards, but you can design and enemy AND a character skin AND a level! In addition to this you also get an Exclusive Signed Postcard with a heart-felt thank you! Also, I really want to meet you, so we can schedule a private Discord / Skype Call so we can talk about whatever you want!

In case the funding is unsuccessful, I will take what was raised of the flexible goal and buy the gear in order of importance.

 

The Impact

I believe my project is not only important to me, but to the world as well. It is important to me because it's my dream to do something like this. I think it can be important to everyone else because it will be a game you to play to have fun, of you are having a bad day, you play my game and you fun and it makes you happy, my goal with Mutantion Miracle has been achieved!

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Making a game solo is always hard, let alone a full commercial game. However, I have what it takes to make this come true. I am perseverant, determined and creative. I'm sure that are things I don't know about game development, but I'm also sure I will learn them along the way. Your support, feedback and critique will also be crucial for the success of this game. I might add that I have already released 10 small games and have never given up on a project.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate, that's fine. I don't want anyone to feel obliged to donate, you only do it if you want and can. There are things you can still do, however, like sharing this campaing, subscribing to my Youtube chanel and following me on my Social Media.

Thanks for everything!

story:
Overview

How cool is it when you find out say your local doctor or congressman might be a gamer. Better yet if they are actually any good! or even if you guys might have gone a few rounds online and didn't even know you were playing each other.

What if gaming was the new golf? 

Are you excited about the intersection of gaming tech where those skills transfer directly into real life skill and work? 

Balance is a professional social network for the other 80% of gamers or so that either aren't all about e-sports and aren't unemployable slackers either.  It's for those that refuse to give up gaming and "grow up" and continue to game even as we struggle to find as much time for it as we get older. This is also a platform where we can bring in some of the excitement of esports without having to compete against others who have dedicated their lives to it.  What if your gaming hobby could lead to useful business connections and support and grants for your ambitions as well. We are about realizing gaming for the asset of a hobby it could actually be.

At the same time we will bring to the community the opportunities for "Joes" to compete with the Pros to both learn from them and to get crushed by them at the same time ;)

For a $10 monthly fee you get access to the network, tournaments and event prize eligibility but also monthly digital swag and merch. We have a goal of potentially offering an indie game or equivalent in virtual goods to all of our members every month even as we scale.

There's a lot more to it than that but should whet your appetite. For more information on the specifics as well as on the 8k VR headset partner that we are co-launching with check out our website at 

https://www.balancegaming.network/ 

What We Need & What You Get

The most important thing is to validate that others find the concept as full of potential as we do and it doesn't take a whole lot. The most important thing is to get your commitment of $10 to prove this is something you are potentially willing to pay for. Everything else is either a perk or a way to provide even more support for us. We will have an alpha network up by November and start some test events and tournaments (with prizes) even this month in October.

$30k to get us going for 6-12 months in a bare bones fashion is great but that's secondary to having the concept validated via as many contributors as possible for showing to investors. With the team and partners we have assembled we need a lot more than just $30k to cover everything we're trying to achieve but that's not what we are looking for from a crowdfunding standpoint.  Buying a headset from our store on our official website also gets us going a lot faster as aside from Balance, we are also participating in Skyworth VR's entry into the US and international western markets. 

Perk wise any contributions now are eligible for ALL preliminary events, member benefits, prizes etc until the end of the year before official launch Xmas '19 or January 2020.

If we don't meet our goal , the funds will still towards helping all activities that result in either growth or sales to bootstrap directly from customers and future subscribers as much as possible without outside funding

The Impact

30k only really just gets the ball rolling if we are actually aiming to use Indiegogo to get us beyond just market validation.  Everything from prize pools to events will be treated strategically on a per event basis. Spending will be careful to ensure each dollar can potentially grow us further organically. At least $1k of validation here can potentially get us this in outside funding

However what might be possible if we can reach new supporters outside of our immediate social networks are also hitting our pre-seed and seed goals for outside funding. These are :-

100k-300k - Part time expenses covered for everyone over the next 6 months with an immediate international focus with non-English speaking regions included from day 1. The beginning of a prizes and benefits budget that we cover ourselves without being compensated via sponsorship. At least $5k of validation here can potentially get us this in outside funding

1 million (per year run-rate) - Full time expenses covered. We can start to push forwards on other services and businesses related to this as well as start offering some of the larger professional support rewards from our partners our of our own pockets. As little as $5-20k of validation here can potentially get us this in outside funding

Risks & Challenges

We don't see much in the way of early risks or challenges other than slow growth or weak adoption. Being able to reach out and acquire as many gamers who also have strong professional backgrounds enough to make the network interesting (students are okay too!) will be the most difficult challenge but not so much with adequate funding. We believe growth will eventually drive itself if the network itself has value and the value of the partner benefits will be able to rise as well in terms of a virtuous circle.

The brilliance of this concept is that we don't need to build much technically from being able to leverage our various partnerships already and we are already have an accomplished network of people between the game industry, tech worlds, influencers and esports.

In the long run the biggest challenge will be how to ensure every subscriber sees some value as our subscribers scale into the millions, we may not be able to offer enough benefits for everyone. However as a result of that "good problem", the network should already offer substantial networking value on its own. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're in a position where you can't afford to contribute at least $10 or like the concept but just want to follow along for now, liking our Facebook page and signing up for our mailing list is also a big help for us to know how many people out there would like to be a part of this. Please also let us know what games you'd like to play via our game survey

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe3C4F...

Also if you've made it this far, join our Discord! 

All the relevant details and links are already on the front page of our website at https://www.balancegaming.network/

story:
On February 21st, 1986, a game was released that would help shape and revolutionize the video game industry for decades to come. This project is intended to honor the success of that franchise by funding new, limited edition merchandise to celebrate the Legendary 35th anniversary.

With your help, we'll be able to professionally design and manufacture 4 unique Nintendo Switch compatible Pro Controller shells, representing iconic characters, costumes and designs from the LoZ series. Want even more characters added to the roster? With stretch goals, we'll be able to expand from the original 4 designs to up to 10 designs (and maybe even more!)

As an artist I have been making custom controllers by hand for many years, and while I could hand paint each and every one of these designs, it's quite the time consuming process. With funding from INDIEGOGO we'll be able to take the digital renders of the controllers and have the custom shells mass produced - saving both time and money, and passing those savings on to consumers!  Start-up production costs are pretty high out of pocket, so being able to judge appropriate demand from a crowdfunding campaign is our best case scenario for this merchandise. Being able to fund not only this project and the backer rewards, but also be able create a back stock of product to continue selling long after the campaign is over will eventually give me the ability to transition all of my work from hand painted to mass produced. This is something that no other custom controller company does, giving us the unique opportunity to bring amazing custom products to gamers at unbeatably low prices you wont find from anyone else. 

For years, gamers have searched far and wide on their adventures for the perfect sword, the perfect shield, heck, even the perfect pair of pants to match that cute outfit that little elf girl gave you for rescuing her pet. Customizing your gameplay experience shouldn't stop when you turn off the game - and that's what Game Armor is all about. Just like your favorite in-game weapons and accessories, we believe that customizing your play experience is a core aspect of gaming, and that includes the controllers and accessories you use to get the job done. 

We also believe that custom consoles and accessories don't need to be solely for those gamers that have a wealth of gold coins. That's why we're dedicated to making our custom controllers and accessories not only top quality, but also top tier value. 

With full funding, we'll unlock 4 exclusive character inspired controller designs - with additional funding, we'll unlock even more! (Check out our stretch goals!)

Additional designs can be unlocked with further funding, starting at only $10,000! Help unlock these chests with additional campaign funding to reveal the design inside!

    Since we already have ready to go samples made of the controllers, we're fortunate enough to have pretty low risks with this campaign. What we do know is that sometimes things happen (like, for example, global pandemics) that could cause factories to shut down and ultimately delay production. We're committed to being transparent, open, and honest with all of our backers so that they're informed every step of the way. We put a pretty generous timeline for production, but hope to deliver even sooner than the campaign specifies. 

    This is a FIXED FUNDING CAMPAIGN - this means if the campaign is NOT funded, all funds will be returned to backers! That makes the funding of the campaign risk free!

    Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

    • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Text, tweet, insta, whatever! Let everyone you know, know about the campaign!

story:
BURNING CRUSADE CLASSIC FEATURES

As with any expansion, Burning Crusade Classic brings with it a variety of content for players to explore. Through the launch and over the course of content updates to follow, players will discover:

New Lands to Explore: Step through the Dark Portal and into Outland.

Two New Playable Races: Fight for the Horde as the blood elves, seeking a new source of arcane power or join the Alliance as the draenei, exiles from Outland in search of a new home.

Arenas: Assemble allies and prove your PvP prowess in 2v2, 3v3, or 5v5 combat in Arenas such as the Ring of Trials and the Circle of Blood.

Flying Mounts: Take flight in the chaotic skies of Netherstorm and soar over fel-touched Shadowmoon Valley with the introduction of flying mounts in Outland.

Master Challenging Raids and Dungeons: Conquer 5-player dungeons and Heroic dungeons set in the crystalline fortress of Tempest Keep, or raid the haunted halls of 10-player Karazhan as you gear up over time for a climactic confrontation against Kil’jaeden in 25-player Sunwell Plateau.

Jewelcrafting: Carve gems of power to socket into players’ gear with the Jewelcrafting profession.

Aldor and Scryer Factions: Choose between the Aldor or Scryer factions in Shattrath and earn their unique rewards

 Create a paladin on the Horde or a shaman on the Alliance.

Level to 70 and gain new class abilities and more.
